Html:
Hello,

I am trying to use Html Agility Pack, but the page I am interested in is partly generated in JavaScript. Is there any chance I could retrieve the page after it has been modified by the .js, rather than before ?

Thanks.
No, HTML Agility Pack is not a browser engine, only a parsing engine. It knows nothing of javascript and has no engine for running JS. You'll need to use a browser to get the html.
